maths.name: Maths
maths.description: You are in the Maths room. There is a blackboard on the West wall. Exit to the East.

questions.question: What is the meaning of life?

hall.name: Hallway
hall.description: You are in the hallway. The Headmaster's office is to the north. The Science room is to the East. The Maths room is to the West. The school exit is South

headmaster.name: Headmaster's Office
headmaster.description: You are in the headmaster's office. You see books lining the walls. There is a smell of old leather and adolescent fear. Exit to the South

science.name: Science
science.description: You are in the science room. There is a strange smell of burning and a smouldering hole in the ceiling. Exit to the West.

yard.name: Schoolyard
yard.description: You are in the yard. The school entrance is in to the North
